name: Horizon Forbidden West: Major Update 1.14
summary: This update includes the much-requested New Game+ feature and Ultra Hard mode for those who want to challenge themselves further, but also a host of quality-of-life features: the transmog feature allows players to easily customize the cosmetics of their equipped outfit to look like any other owned outfit, and with respec players are enabled to reset their skill points and redistribute them freely.
